fulltext:
Nguyen Le  
Web Developer 
 PERSONAL INFORMATION  
       Full name:             Le Cao Nguyen  
Date of birth: 
July 20, 1992 
Gender: 
 Male 
Phone: 
 0965.465.883 
Email: 
 caonguyenle007@gmail.com 
Address: 
          Thu Duc District, Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam 
CAREER OBJECTIVE 
■ Short-term goal: 
   - I want to takes a lot of difference positions of software development. 
   - Improve my English skills. 
■ Long-term goal: 
 - I want to be a master of web development within 5 years and become a trainer. 
EDUCATION 
Sep 2010 - Feb 2015 
HCMC University of Technology and Education 
Major: Information Technology. 
GPA: 7.39 
EXPERIENCE  
RECORD 
Aug 2018 – Present 
◆  Company: FPT Software HCM. 
◆  Project Overview: This project allow the customer can send goods from USA to 
Vietnam via plane.  
◆  Main Position: Senior Software Engineer, Sub-Leader 
◆  Main responsibilities: 
- Refactor backend source code using NodeJS language. 
- Fix performance issues related to how to query data using NodeJS and Mongo DB. 
- Implement new feature (using NodeJS and AngularJS) and fix bug. 
- Create API for mobile using. 
- Support training members using technical related to NodeJS and Angular. 
- Review source code of member, merge source and deploy to the server for testing. 
- Analyze current business and suggest to PM betters things. 
◆  Experience gained: 
- Improve skill about define Mongo DB database and how to query with big records 
without performance issues. 
- Improve review code skill. 
- Improve communicate with team member skill, especially how to explain my ideal or 
solution to other members. 
- Improve business analysis skill. 
- New experience working with report and control tasks. 
◆  Company: FPT Software HCM. 
◆  Project Overview: This project is a small social network (like Facebook) use only for 
a company. 
◆  Main Position: Senior Software Engineer. 
Apr 2018 – Jul 2018 
◆  Main responsibilities: 
- Create the template base on the UI/UX of designer using AngularJS language. 
- Create and run unit test. 
- Integrate API with backend team. 
- Analyze REQs. 
- Support review code from other members. 
- Testing and bug fixing. 
◆  Experience gained: 
- Experience working with the first customer in the EU (Switzerland). 
- Experience working with the development use Scrum Agile model. 
- Improve business analysis skill. 
- Improve review code skill. 
- Experience working with design use typography and taxonomy techniques. 
- Experience with create unit test using AngularJS. 
◆  Company: FPT Software HCM. 
◆  Project Overview: Create an application allow the customer can take interesting 
pictures when they are on the flight and share to the social networks. 
◆  Main Position: Senior Software Engineer. 
Dec 2017 – Mar 2018 
◆  Main responsibilities: 
- Refactor current backend source code. 
- Implement new features and fix bug of the system. (Both of Backend and Front-end). 
- Implement API for mobile using. 
- Support deploy server. 
◆  Experience gained: 
- How to create a backend structure use NodeJS language can be used for both of web 
and mobile. 
- How to create template base on UI/UX of designer. (Zeplin and Invision) 
- Experience practice with new language: Angular 5 
◆  Company: TMA Solutions 
◆  Project Overview: This project related to multimedia with Robot activity. We are 
develop and deploy to actual robot. 
◆  Main Position: Software Engineer 
◆  Main responsibilities: 
   - Support the customer investigate solutions to resolve some processing related 
on single thread of JavaScript. 
   - Receive Basic Design, analysis REQs, create estimation and transfer REQs to 
team members. 
   - Coding base on detail design, create and run UT test code. 
Apr 2017 –  Nov 2017 
   - Setup environment for development and testing. 
   - Support team members investigate source code and new REQs. 
   - Support review code of team member. 
   - Weekly and daily report status to the managers. 
◆  Experience gained: 
   - Basic knowledge about load balancing technical. 
   - How to use Child process in NodeJS. 
   - Analyze basic document from the customer, confirm ideal, and transfer to team 
members. 
   - How to make Q&A effectively. 
   - How to create estimation. 
Nov 2016 – Apr 2017 
◆  Company: TMA Solutions 
◆  Project Overview: This project related to Robot activity. We are develop and deploy 
to actual robot. 
◆  Main position: Software Engineer 
◆  Main responsibilities: 
   - Read document, investigate source code about a system. 
   - Coding new feature base on existing source code. 
   - Report status to Leader. 
◆  Experience gained: 
   - The way to maintain a project. 
   - NodeJS and AngularJS programming language. 
   - Asynchronous technical. 
Apr 2015 - Nov 2016 
◆  Company: TMA Solutions 
◆  Project overview:  
   - All projects are belong to Japan’s E-commerce website. 
◆  Main position: Software Engineer. 
◆  Main responsibilities: 
 - Receive idea from the customer, create detail design. 
 - Coding, run unit test, feature test base on detail design. 
 - Coding new feature of product. 
 - Report status to Leader. 
◆   Experience gained: 
    - PHP programming language. 
    - The way to apply knowledge at the school to actual project. 
    - The way to create detail design base on ideal of the customer. 
    - The way to create manual UT test case. 
    - The way to run System test, opening bug processing, fix bug processing. 
    - The way to use Redmine, SVN, and Bitbucket. 
SKILLS  AND PRACTICES 
FE programming 
language 
HTML5, CSS3, JQuery, AngularJS, Angular, SCSS 
BE programming 
language 
PHP (Eccube framework base on Symfony 2), NodeJS (Express framework) 
Database 
MySQL, pgAdmin, MongoDB 
Source code 
management 
Git, Bitbucket, SVN 
Environment 
Windows, Linux 
Other 
JSON, UML, Vagrant, Mocha (NodeJS testing framework) 
Languages 
Vietnamese (Native), English (Advanced), Japanese (Advanced)
